00002 // Generates the csh files needed to submit jobs to propagate errors
00003 // associated with shapes.
00004 // To compile, need to add genShapeSyst to EXTRABINS in GNUmakefile,
00005 // and add CLHEP to link_BToDKTo3piK

00026 //----------------------------------------------------
00027 void check(const char slash, const char trueSlash, int occurrence, int line) {
00028   if (trueSlash != slash){
00029     cerr << " on occurrence " << occurrence << " line " << line
00030          << " read \'" << slash << "\' which is not \'" << trueSlash
00031          << "\'. Did you give the wrong # of lines?" << endl;
00032     assert(0);
00033   }
00034 }

00037 //----------------------------------------------------
00038 void readMatrix(HepSymMatrix & matrix, int size, istream & stream){
00039   for (int i = 0; i < size; ++i){
00040     // remove the first '//':
00041     char slash;
00042     stream.get(slash);
00043     check(slash, '/', 1, i);
00044     stream.get(slash);
00045     check(slash, '/', 2, i);
00046     
00047     // read rest of line:
00048     const int SIZE = 1000;
00049     char line[SIZE];
00050     stream.getline(line, SIZE);
00051     istrstream lineStream(line);
00052 
00053     // then read the #'s:
00054     for (int j = 0; j < size; ++j){
00055       double d;
00056       lineStream >> d;
00057       matrix(i+1, j+1) = d;
00058     }
00059   }
00060 }

00062 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
00063 int genShapeSyst(istream & stream, 
00064                  string baseName, 
00065                  int npar, double scale = 1) {
00066 
00067   cout << "Reading " << npar << " parameter lines" << endl;
00068   string * names = new string[npar];
00069   HepMatrix tempParams(npar, 1);
00070   HepMatrix tempErrors(npar, 1);
00071   const int SIZE = 1000;
00072   char line[SIZE];
00073   int nFreePar = 0;
00074 
00075   for (int p = 0; p < npar; ++p) {
00076     // read full line to a temp char* that is then discarded:
00077     stream.getline(line, SIZE, '=');
00078 
00079     // read name and value from line:
00080     istrstream lineStream(line);
00081     char name[SIZE];
00082     lineStream.getline(name, SIZE, '=');
00083 
00084     double param;
00085     double error;
00086     stream >> param;
00087 
00088     // figure out if the param is fixed:
00089     stream.getline(line, SIZE, '(');
00090     if (0 == strchr(line, 'C')) {
00091       // not fixed, take it and increment index of free pars::
00092       tempParams(nFreePar+1, 1) = param;
00093       names[nFreePar] = name;    
00094       ++nFreePar;
00095 
00096       // read the error:
00097       istrstream lineStream(line);
00098       char plusMinus[20];
00099       lineStream >> plusMinus;      
00100 //      lineStream >>  tempErrors(nFreePar+1, 1);
00101       lineStream >>  tempErrors(nFreePar+0, 1);
00102     }
00103 
00104     // read to the end of the stream line:
00105     stream.getline(line, SIZE);    
00106   }
00107 
00108   // Copy tempParams into a final vector of the right size:
00109   HepMatrix params(nFreePar, 1);  
00110   HepMatrix errors(nFreePar, 1);  
00111   int fp;
00112   for (fp = 0; fp < nFreePar; ++fp) {
00113     params(fp+1, 1) = tempParams(fp+1, 1);
00114     errors(fp+1, 1) = tempErrors(fp+1, 1);
00115   }
00116 
00117   cout << "Found " << nFreePar << " floating parameters." << endl;
00118   cout << "Reading " << nFreePar << "x" << nFreePar 
00119        << " error matrix with leading //" 
00120        << endl;
00121   
00122   HepSymMatrix mat(nFreePar);
00123   readMatrix(mat, nFreePar, stream);
00124   HepSymMatrix diag = mat;
00125   HepMatrix trans = diagonalize(&diag);
00126    
00127   // the collelation matrix:
00128   HepSymMatrix corr(nFreePar);
00129   for (int row = 1; row <= nFreePar; ++row){
00130     for (int col = 1; col <= nFreePar; ++col) {
00131       corr(row, col) = mat(row, col) / sqrt(mat(row, row) * mat(col, col));
00132     }
00133   }
00134 
00135   cout << "I got " << endl;
00136   for (fp = 0; fp < nFreePar; ++fp) {
00137     cout << names[fp] << " = " << params(fp+1, 1) << " +/- " 
00138          << errors(fp+1, 1) << endl;
00139   }
00140   cout << "matrix= " << mat << endl
00141        << "corr  = " << corr << endl
00142        << "diag  = " << diag << endl
00143        << "trans  = " << trans << endl;
00144 
00145   HepMatrix invTrans = trans;
00146   int fail;
00147   invTrans.invert(fail);
00148   if (0 != fail) {
00149     cerr << "*********************************************" << endl
00150          << "Error inverting transformation matrix. Doing nothing." << endl
00151          << "*********************************************" << endl;
00152   }
00153 
00154   // the parameters in the diagonal basis:
00155   HepMatrix paramsDiag = invTrans * params;
00156 
00157   cout << "recalculating diag: " << invTrans * mat * trans << endl;
00158 
00159   cout << "invTrans= " << invTrans << endl
00160        << "paramsDiag= " << paramsDiag << endl
00161        << "trans*paramsDiag = "<< trans*paramsDiag <<endl;
00162   
00163   // Check errors and matrix:
00164   for (fp = 0; fp < nFreePar; ++fp) {
00165     const double TOL = 0.05;
00166     double diff = 1 - errors(fp+1, 1) / sqrt(mat(fp+1, fp+1));
00167     if (fabs(diff) > TOL) {
00168       cerr << "WARNING: found relative diff of " << diff 
00169            << " between error (" << errors(fp+1, 1) << ") and sqrt of "
00170            << "  matrix element (" << sqrt(mat(fp+1, fp+1)) 
00171            << " )for parameter " << fp << ": " 
00172            << names[fp] << endl;
00173     }
00174   }
00175 
00176   // for each +/- 1 sigma change in diag, generate a new par vector:
00177   for (fp = 0; fp < nFreePar; ++fp) {
00178     // get fp into a string (they should have had an operator+(int) for this!):
00179     ostrstream fpStream;
00180     fpStream << fp << ends;
00181     string fpString = fpStream.str();
00182 
00183     // shift param fp by + 1 sigma & write new par file:
00184     string parFilePlusName = baseName + "+";
00185     parFilePlusName += fpString;
00186     parFilePlusName += ".par";
00187 
00188 
00189     cout<<" diag matrix elements "<<fp+1<<" - "<<fp+1<<" value "
00190         <<diag(fp+1,fp+1)<<endl;
00191 
00192     ofstream parFilePlus(parFilePlusName.c_str());
00193 
00194     HepMatrix paramsDiagShiftedP = paramsDiag;
00195     paramsDiagShiftedP(fp + 1, 1) += sqrt(diag(fp+1, fp+1)) * scale;
00196     HepMatrix paramsShiftedP = trans * paramsDiagShiftedP;
00197 
00198     cout<<" invTrans*paramsDiagP "<< paramsShiftedP <<endl;
00199 
00200     // fix this:
00201     for (int fpp = 0; fpp < nFreePar; ++fpp) {
00202       parFilePlus << names[fpp] << "  =  "
00203                   << paramsShiftedP(fpp+1, 1) << endl;
00204     }
00205 
00206     // shift by -1 sigma:
00207     string parFileMinusName = baseName + "-";
00208     parFileMinusName += fpString;
00209     parFileMinusName += ".par";
00210 
00211     ofstream parFileMinus(parFileMinusName.c_str());
00212 
00213     HepMatrix paramsDiagShiftedM = paramsDiag;
00214     paramsDiagShiftedM(fp + 1, 1) -= sqrt(diag(fp+1, fp+1)) * scale;
00215     HepMatrix paramsShiftedM = trans * paramsDiagShiftedM;
00216 
00217     cout<<" invTrans*paramsDiagM "<< paramsShiftedM <<endl;
00218 
00219 
00220     // fix this:
00221     for (int fpm = 0; fpm < nFreePar; ++fpm) {
00222       parFileMinus << names[fpm] << "  =  " 
00223                    << paramsShiftedM(fpm+1, 1)  << endl;
00224     }
00225 
00226     cout << "Wrote files " << parFilePlusName << " and " << parFileMinusName 
00227          << endl;
00228   }
00229   
00230   return 0;
00231 }

00233 //----------------------------------------------------
00234 void cleanStream(istream & inStream, string & outString) {
00235   // Clean up inStream and put the results in outString for one PDF fit:
00236   int nDollars = 0;
00237   while(nDollars < 2) {
00238     // read 1 char at a time:
00239     char c1 = 'Z';
00240     inStream.get(c1);
00241 
00242     if (inStream.eof()) {
00243       cout << "eof reached" << endl;
00244       break;
00245     }
00246 
00247     if (inStream.bad()) {
00248       cout << "inStream BAD" << endl;
00249       break;
00250     }
00251 
00252     assert('$' != c1);
00253     
00254     if ('/' != c1) {
00255       // non comment, copy it:
00256       outString += c1;
00257     }
00258     else {
00259       // see if it's a "//":
00260       char c2;
00261       inStream.get(c2);
00262       
00263       assert('$' != c2);
00264 
00265       if ('/' != c2) {
00266         // not a "//", copy it:
00267         outString += c1;
00268         outString += c2;
00269       }
00270       else {
00271         // a "//". See if it's a "//$":
00272         char c3; 
00273         inStream.get(c3);
00274         
00275         if ('$' != c3) {
00276           // not a "//$", copy it:
00277           outString += c1;
00278           outString += c2;
00279           outString += c3;
00280         }
00281         else {
00282           // it's a "//$". Count $'s and don't put in outString:
00283           ++nDollars;
00284 
00285           // remove the rest of the line from the inStream:
00286           char c4[1000];
00287           inStream.getline(c4, 1000);
00288           cout << "on cleaning line read \"" << c4 << "\"" << endl;
00289         } // end of c3 check
00290       } // end of c2 check
00291     } // end of c1 check
00292   } // end main loop
00293 }

00295 //----------------------------------------------------
00296 int count(const char * key, const string & inStr, string & pdfName) {
00297   // count occurrences of key in inStr and figure out pdfName:
00298   int result = 0;
00299   int pos = 0;
00300   string lastPdfName;
00301 
00302   while (1) {
00303     pos = inStr.find(key, pos);
00304     if (string::npos == pos) {
00305       break;
00306     }
00307     ++result; // count
00308     ++pos;     // start next search on next char
00309     
00310     // get the next word, which is the pdfName:
00311     int startPos = inStr.find('.');
00312     int endPos = inStr.find('.', startPos+1);
00313 
00314     pdfName = inStr.substr(startPos, endPos-startPos);
00315 
00316     // check that his didn't chang:
00317     if (0 != lastPdfName.length()) {
00318       assert(lastPdfName == pdfName);
00319     }
00320 
00321     // store for comparison later next loop:
00322     lastPdfName = pdfName;
00323   }
00324   return result;
00325 }

00328 int main() {
00329   cout << "enter path to input files (    params/DK/    ): " << ends;
00330   string inPath;
00331   cin >> inPath;
00332 
00333   cout << "enter path for output files (    syst/    ): " << ends;
00334   string outPath;
00335   cin >> outPath;
00336 
00337   cout << "enter input file: " << ends;
00338   string inFileName;
00339   cin >> inFileName;
00340 
00341   cout << "Enter # of sigmas of change you want to make: " << ends;
00342   double scale;
00343   cin >> scale;
00344 
00345   string fullInFileName = inPath + inFileName;
00346   cout << "working on " << fullInFileName << endl;
00347   system(string("ls " + fullInFileName).c_str());
00348 
00349   ifstream inFile(fullInFileName.c_str());
00350 
00351   while(1) { // until end of file:
00352     // extract only good info from inFile into cleanOstream for one PDF:
00353     string cleanString;
00354     cleanStream(inFile, cleanString);
00355 
00356     cout << "clean string is \"" << cleanString << "\"" << endl;
00357 
00358     // Count params and ger pdf name:
00359     string pdfName;
00360     int npar = count("pdfOnResDK.", cleanString, pdfName);
00361 
00362     if (0 == npar) {
00363       break;
00364     }
00365 
00366     // pass this info on to make the new input files for this PDF:
00367     istrstream cleanIstream(cleanString.c_str());    
00368     string fileBaseName = outPath + inFileName + pdfName;
00369     genShapeSyst(cleanIstream, fileBaseName, npar, scale);
00370   }
00371 }
